name: Xīn Suǒ Xiàngwǎng de Běijíxīng
summary: A text adventure game that combines the elements of beauty, suspense and love. A visual novel game, the player takes the role of the main character in the story and uses options to advance the story to different endings.

name: Xīnnián
summary: A 5-player asymmetric game, where an ancestral dragon wants to take soul from New Year Festival while they try to escape.
